talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Hellooo! Welcome to Marot Mart!


Our convenient general goods store, the
Coral Reef, is open, but our esteemed
workshop, the Hammerhead, is closed.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:LaughS_00>Alsooo... <sp:5:0:0>Kee-hee...


I wrote a sequel to my sludge song!
You...want to hear it, right?
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_01>YES! OK, listen up.<sp:5:0:0> After reflecting on
the original, I decided to make this one
much more adorable. AHEM.
I present a new work with lyrics by Marot,<sp:5:0:0>
music by Marot,<sp:5:0:0> and performed by,
<sp:5:0:0>you guessed it, <sp:5:0:0>me! Marot!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Humming_00>♪Icky, yicky sludge, your time is through!
Icky, yicky sludge, we will stop you!♪

♪When we throw water in your face,
you disappear without a trace!♪

<snd:Humming_01>♪Filthy sludge, you won't be spared!
Filthy sludge, you're running scared!♪

♪Hey now! You! You know what I mean?
Our sweet domain is finally clean!♪

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>That's the song!<sp:5:1:0> It really was adorable,
wasn't it?

In reality, the sludge is still falling, and
it's not clean in the domain yet. But,
you know, artistic license and all that.
near0002: Ugh, the sludge is so thick.
talk2030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>HUH?! He wanted that many crabs?


*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> So that's why he was saying all of
that weird crabby stuff.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>If he likes crabs that much, then I'll have
to go find some for him.
talk2031:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>I'm sorry, but Marot Mart doesn't sell any
clothes for Hylians, so you're flat out of
luck, mister.
talk2032:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>So... You came all the way here like that,
huh? Must have been chilly.
talk2033:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad>I wonder if something is up with Cleff from
the general store.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Crab this and shell that...<sp:5:0:0> He keeps
mumbling weird stuff like that!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>♪Welcome!♪


If you need the general store or the
workshop, you'll find them here.
♪This...is Marot Mart!♪
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>That's not all! You can also listen to the
highly anticipated sequel to the sludge
song! Kee-hee! You want to hear it, right?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm showing customers around. Except...


Well, the only problem is that no one's
coming around because of the sludge.

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>That junk seems to always be on my
mind these days.

I actually wrote a song about the sludge...
You wouldn't want to hear it, would you?
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Oh, that?


<sp:3:0:2:0901>Well, in retrospect it was a little too dark,
so I canceled it.<sp:5:0:0> That song is no more!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM>Hey, Grandpa!<sp:5:1:0> I know it's been a while,
but we have a customer here!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Grandpa Dentooo! <sp:5:0:0>Oh, come on...
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>Let's throw the silly ol' original in the
river. I'll sing the sequel for you instead!
talk2024:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think><sp:0:2:2:5000>He's unconsciously talking about crabs again...
That is just so weird...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Even when the sludge comes falling down,
my grandpa stays just like that.

If there's an emergency situation, as his
granddaughter, I'll have to find a way to
carry him to safety.
talk2025:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>If you ask me,<sp:5:0:0> Cleff from the general store
has been acting odd recently.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Crab this...<sp:5:0:0> Shell that...<sp:5:1:0> He's mumbling
stuff like that all the time these days!

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sad>I wonder if something's wrong...
talk2012:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>A fabulous deal awaits you at...<sp:5:0:0>
♪Marot Mart!♪

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Welcome to Marot Mart, <sp:5:1:0>the best store
in Lanayru! I mean, as far as I know,
anyway...
Our convenient general goods store,
the Coral Reef, and our esteemed
workshop, the Hammerhead, are open!
<snd:LaughS_00>♪As you know, I'm Marot. Allow me to tell
you all about theeem!♪
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> A customer!


Welcome to Marot Mart!<sp:5:0:0> Let me tell you
about our fine facilities.

Our convenient general goods store, the
Coral Reef, is open. Yes, even during
these unusual times.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Then there's our esteemed workshop,
The Hammerhead...<sp:5:0:0>which is unfortunately
closed as of now.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Oh, and the one reading dusty old texts in
the library is Laflat.<sp:5:0:0> She's no shopkeeper,
but rather the royal secretary.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Welcome to Marot Mart!


That said, due to the sludge, we're not
getting many customers these days...

So basically the only thing I can do is sing
songs about the sludge.
talk2027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wahoo! I have something wonderful to
tell you!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>My grandpa Dento, the great blacksmith,
said that he can finally do some work at
his workshop.
Maybe he'll make you something!
talk2014:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Welcome to Marot Mart! Here you'll find
our general goods store and workshop.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Sorry about that.


The Hammerhead, our workshop that
we're so very proud of, is temporarily
closed.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>As you know, my grandpa Dento is the
best blacksmith around.

But since the sludge started falling, he's
been in quite the foul mood.
talk2028:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Our convenient general goods store,
the Coral Reef, has procured a bunch
of yummy fish!
And our esteemed workshop,
the Hammerhead, is open and ready
to craft some incredible weapons!
talk2029:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Did you happen to talk to Cleff?


<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Was he saying stuff like "crab" and "shell"
and "pinch"? Things like that?
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_01>Great! Then please listen up. AHEM.


I present a work with lyrics by Marot,<sp:5:0:0>
music by Marot,<sp:5:0:0> and performed by,
<sp:5:0:0>you guessed it, <sp:5:0:0>me! Marot!
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Humming_00>♪Sludge!<sp:5:0:0> Sludge!<sp:5:0:0> It's filling up
the domain!♪

♪It's thick and gross and on
everything!♪

<snd:Humming_01>♪Gills full o' mud! Fins thick with
sludge!♪

♪Even this song's kind of a trudge...
IT'S THE SLUDGE!♪

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_01>Kee-hee! There you go!<sp:5:0:0> It actually
cheered me up having you listen to
my song!
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Wait... <sp:5:0:0>You didn't lose heart because you
had to listen to that...right?

Um, if that's the case... Sorry about that.
